entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow at times overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
